mahacharyawaraya ‘akuna’ ha sambandha wi wadiduratath pawasuwe angaharu ga්rahaya heta dinayedi pruthiwiyata kilo mitara miliyana 57.6k durin gaman ganna athara mema wishala dureksha magin mema ga්rahaloka janathawata dakaganimata awasthawa labadime ratha්ri ahasa nirikshana kandawurak ada ratha්ri 7.00 sita 10.00 dakwa kolambaa wishwa widyala ka්rida pitiyedi pawathwena bawayi.

atham ki්radakayan siyanatharu pitiyata enawita hariyata uda panagandawath nohaki wu aya.eheth siyanatharu pitiya thulin labu ka්ramawath puhunuwa saha upades nisath tharagakari ki්radawakata awathirnawennata awasthawa labima nisath owun pasukaleka sha්ri lankawa niyojanaya kala daksha ki්radakayan bawata pathwuna.ewani aithihasika, abhimanawath ki්radapitiyak thamayi siyanatharu ki්rada samajayata ahimi wune..thawa thawath udaw di kirthimath karannata watina ki්rada samajaya eka payakin parata thallu kala.
"lamayi ranchu ranchu genath ra i¼ndan eliwenakal dasa wadha denawa" aacharyawarunta kuli niwese pawathwagena giya wadhakagaraya gana thorathuru labini.

awuruddakata pas wathawak thulabhara dana denawa.
mema web adawiya wadi diyunu karamin sitiyi.

ada thathwaya kumak da?
thawa duratath mema prashnaya adinna ba.
